title:
On the center of the ring of differential operators on a smooth variety
  over $\bZ/p^n\bZ$

title_detail.value:
On the center of the ring of differential operators on a smooth variety
  over $\bZ/p^n\bZ$

summary:
We compute the center of the ring of PD differential operators on a smooth
variety over $\bZ/p^n\bZ$ confirming a conjecture of Kaledin. More generally,
given an associative algebra $A_0$ over $\bF_p$ and its flat deformation $A_n$
over $\bZ/p^{n+1}\bZ$ we prove that under a certain non-degeneracy condition
the center of $A_n$ is isomorphic to the ring of length $n+1$ Witt vectors over
the center of $A_0$.

ON THE CENTER OF THE RING OF DIFFERENTIAL
OPERATORS ON A SMOOTH VARIETY OVER Z/pn Z.
ALLEN STEWART

VADIM VOLOGODSKY

Abstract. We compute the center of the ring of PD differential operators on
a smooth variety over Z/pn Z confirming a conjecture of Kaledin. More generally, given an associative algebra A0 over Fp and its flat deformation An over
Z/pn+1 Z we prove that under a certain non-degeneracy condition the center of
An is isomorphic to the ring of length n + 1 Witt vectors over the center of A0 .
